name: Depths of Insanity (itch)
description:
Horror has a face, and it may be your own!

You are a researcher deep in the depths of the ocean and you've come across something out of this world. The reality-bending properties of what you've found has started to cause time loops that challenge your sanity. Can you  complete the spell and put an end to it all before the past versions of yourself put an end to you?

Controls: WASD to move, E to interact.
